org.gvsig.raster.grid
Class GridExtent

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.raster.datastruct.Extent
      org.gvsig.raster.grid.GridExtent

public class GridExtent
extends Extent

This class defines a grid system (coordinates and cellsize)

Author:
Victor Olaya (volaya@ya.com)
